name: tensai-browser-extension
description: AI-powered productivity tools for web browsing - Text generation, translation, summarization, and more
author: TensAI Team

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge
scripts.build:chrome: mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp manifest.json dist/chrome/ && cp -r src dist/chrome/ && [ -d assets ] && cp -r assets dist/chrome/ || true
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json && cp -r src dist/firefox/ && [ -d assets ] && cp -r assets dist/firefox/ || true
scripts.build:edge: mkdir -p dist/edge && cp manifest.json dist/edge/ && cp -r src dist/edge/ && [ -d assets ] && cp -r assets dist/edge/ || true
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist && cp -r src dist/ && [ -d assets ] && cp -r assets dist/ || true
scripts.dev: npm run copy:assets && npm run watch
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip:chrome && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:edge
